message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm looking to save some money on this purchase.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $100? This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92. I'm really trying to stick to my budget on this one.
